mapper.select: SELECT a.ifamSeq , a.ifamName , a.ifamAge , a.ifamKind , a.ifamGender , a.ifamChipNY , a.ifamVaccinateNY , b.ifmmSeq FROM animal a JOIN member b ON a.mm_ifmmSeq = b.ifmmSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY a.ifamSeq DESC;
SELECT ifmmSeq FROM member ORDER BY ifmmSeq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ifamSeq FROM animal ORDER BY ifamSeq DESC LIMIT 1
